chara.textHome:
I grew up in an orphanage called the
Azalea House, but I don't remember
anythin' before that.

I was abandoned when
I was a year old or so...

They said they found me out
behind a ramen shop.
Just tucked in next to all the chicken bones!
Makes me so mad...
Still, I love ramen!
I've been carvin' something pretty big lately.
I guess it's not carving so much as sculptin'?
I mean, I use a chainsaw to do it!
Is this what I think it is?!
I'm super strong now!
I get it, I get it!
I...uh, I feel different now!

When I was real little I used to just say
whatever was on my mind,
you could read it on my face.
I'm still like that, actually...
Guess that's just who I am!

The director who brought me up
was my real mom to me.
She was kind and always smilin'.
But she died...
So us three have to live to our fullest, for her!
Hey, hey, heyyy! How's it goin'?!
I'm doin' super-duper awesome today!
I've been waitin' for ya!
Now let's go!
Where?
Umm...I dunno, let's just start runnin'!

Good morning, good morning,
 good morning!
I tried packin' in three in row!
Aaand...here's a punch to top it off!
How's that? You awake yet?
Want me to punch you again?
My stomach won't shut up!
I gonna eat SO much!
I don't care what it is, let's just eat already!

Time for dinner! But before anything 
else, ugh... Gotta go Witch huntin'...

This is where I say, 
"It's work, can't complain."
I heard that line on a TV show!
*Yawn* Sleepy! I'm so sleepy at night!

I'm good at gettin' up early,
but bad at stayin' up late.
I'm gonna fall asleep any minute.
Seriously, just watch. 3, 2, 1...
zZz...
Me, Hazuki, and Konoha...
We all live every day to the fullest.
That's what we decided, all together.

So I always go 100%, 
the whole time I'm awake!

What, what?
We're gonna try somethin' new?
Yayyy, let's do it! I bet it'll be fun!

I mean, I dunno what it is,
but let's give it a shot!
You're gonna fight me, right?
Okay, I'm in!
But lemme tell you this.
I won't hold back one bit, all right?!
I'm gonna go at you with everythin' I got!
Heyyy, look! Look! A locust!

You gotta get 'em just before
they jump, like...THIS!

See? With my bare hands.
I don't need a net!

Have you ever tasted
the nectar in a flower?
It's sooo sweet and delicious!
My favorite has gotta be azalea nectar.
Our teacher always used to give me some.
I can't cook anything, but I looove eating!

Just the other day I ate
300 bowls of wanko soba!
I did kinda pass out after, though...

Some animals are really, really 
tough in a fight.

I'm studyin' their moves to
see if I can copy 'em.
I'm startin' with bears and wolves...
Oh, koalas could be good, too!

There are tons of Witches in Kamihama,
so there's also tons of Magical Girls.

But the three of us are definitely
the strongest team,
no doubt about it!
There's somethin' about that Felicia girl.

I dunno, but I really don't want to 
lose when I'm with her.
I dunno why!
You could say I'm really competitive!

Even if it's somethin' with no point, like,
"who can count to 100 the fastest",
I still end up gettin' really into it!

When I was younger, I would explode at
people over any old thing.
But now I've grown up!
Huh?  I'm still the same?!
No way, no waaay!
Sometimes...just SOMETIMES,
I think about tryin' on a dress!
Hehe. I am a lady after all!
Hee hee!
I'm gonna beat 'em up real good!
Yeah! We can do anythin'!
Whew, perfectly done, don'tcha think?
I'm the best, just sayin'!

I finished that one
so awesomely it felt great!
Yooo!
I'm Ayame Mikuri, happy to meetcha!
Uh, what else should I say...
Ummm...whatever! Let's get goin'!
Woohoo!
The power just comes in like ZOOOM!
Whoa, whoa, whoooa! Nice!
This rocks!
Aaah, look what I found!
It'll keep feelin' like this the more I go, right?!

The only class I like as much as P.E.
is shop class!
I love carving wood!

First thing I ever made was a bunny,
but it looked kinda lousy...

The best thing I ever carved
was a bear with a fish in its mouth!
See the fishie here?
You think it's a salmon, right?
Wrong! It's a mackerel!
Cause it can be either a river or ocean fish!
